report.title: Unexpected High
report.author: Ajaxx
report.bodytext: After being prescribed Lyrica for some time now, I have just come to the realization that this drug can actually produce a very euphoric feeling. I Decided tonight to take a higher dose than I normally do to see what effect it might have on me. So far I am very pleased. It produces an effect similar to a high dose of valium. Kind of like the first time I ever tried a Benzo. My moter function is completly lost as I wander around with a cloud like feeling of floating. Things seem to be a lot more funny to me than when not taking the drug, like I'm giggling at everything for no reason. It's quite fun.
